tr.td: The main neuroConstruct paper. An introduction to all of the key functionality, including some network examples.

p.strong: Padraig Gleeson, Volker Steuber, R. Angus Silver

p.em: neuroConstruct: A Tool for Modeling Networks of Neurons in 3D Space, Neuron, Volume 54, Issue 2, 19 April 2007, Pages 219-235.

tr.td: The introductory paper to MorphML. Compares morphological representations from NEURON, GENESIS, Neurolucida and neuroConstruct to MorphML.

p.strong: Sharon Crook, Padraig Gleeson, Fred Howell, Joe Svitak, R. Angus Silver

p.em: MorphML: Level 1 of the NeuroML Standards for Neuronal Morphology Data and Model Specification, Neuroinformatics 2007, Volume 5; Number 2, Pages 96-104
